data.comment: The match has started.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 1, Thomas Leonard signals a throw-in for Lorient, close to Angers's area.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Andrew Gravillon for Lorient who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in Lorient.
In the minute 5, Lorient to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Andrew Gravillon has recovered and rejoins the match in Angers.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 6, Thomas Leonard signals a Angers throw-in in Lorient's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Angers's Stephane Bahoken gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
Thomas Leonard awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 8, Lorient's Armand Lauriente misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 9, Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Angers to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 10, Angelo Fulgini puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
In the minute 14, Free kick Angers.
Thomas Leonard awards Lorient a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Angers.
In the minute 17, Angers have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Angers's Stephane Bahoken breaks free at Stade Raymond Kopa. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Lorient.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Trevoh Chalobah.
In the minute 21, Ibrahim Amadou (Angers) gets a yellow card.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Lorient's Trevoh Chalobah looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Thomas Leonard signals a Lorient throw-in in Angers's half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Pierre-Yves Hamel is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 26, Vincent Manceau is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Lorient's Pierre-Yves Hamel is back in action after a slight knock.
Angersâ€™s Vincent Manceau is on his feet again at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 27, Lorient to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Free kick for Angers in the half of Lorient.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 29, Lorient needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
In Angers Angers attack through Stephane Bahoken. The finish is off target, however.
Thomas Leonard awards Lorient a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thomas Leonard signals a Lorient throw-in in Angers's half.
In the minute 36, Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In Angers, Angelo Fulgini of Angers is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Lorient in the half of Angers.
In the minute 37, Laurent Abergel of Lorient smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 40, Sofiane Boufal (Angers) has received a first yellow card.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Lorient.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Angers in the half of Lorient.
Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Angers.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 45, Lorient push forward at Stade Raymond Kopa and Armand Lauriente gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Angers defence.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Stephane Bahoken (Angers) has received a yellow card from Thomas Leonard.
In the minute 46, Thomas Leonard has blown to start the second-half.
Thomas Leonard awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Lorient.
In the minute 48, Angers have a goal kick.
Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lorient's half?
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 52, Sofiane Boufal gets his shot on target but fails to score for Angers.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sofiane Boufal for Angers who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Stephane Moulin is making the team's first substitution at Stade Raymond Kopa with Jimmy Cabot replacing Sofiane Boufal.
In the minute 56, Lorient to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lassana Coulibaly is on a sub for Ibrahim Amadou for Angers.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Angers.
Angers have a goal kick.
Angers's Jimmy Cabot gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lorient defender.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Angers.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
In the minute 62, In Angers Lorient drive forward through Pierre-Yves Hamel. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Thomas Leonard awards the home team a throw-in.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Angers.
In the minute 70, Quentin Boisgard is replacing Yoane Wissa for Lorient at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Fabien Lemoine for Lorient gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Thomas Leonard awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Angers.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In Angers, Andrew Gravillon (Lorient) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
The away team replace Fabien Lemoine with Enzo Le Fee.
Lorient make their third substitution with Terem Moffi replacing Pierre-Yves Hamel.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Free kick Angers.
In the minute 77, Julien Laporte is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Angers's Angelo Fulgini gets in a shot on goal at Stade Raymond Kopa. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Thomas Leonard signals a Lorient throw-in in Angers's half.
In the minute 80, Lorient's Andrew Gravillon breaks free at Stade Raymond Kopa. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Julien Laporte for Lorient is back on the field again.
In the minute 81, Angers have a dangerous throw-in.
At Stade Raymond Kopa, Angers are penalized for being offside.
Angers needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 82, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Lorient are pushing forward but Quentin Boisgard's finish is wide of the goal.
Thomas Leonard awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Stephane Bahoken with Lois Diony. This is the third substitution made today by Stephane Moulin.
Stephane Moulin (Angers) is making a fourth substitution, with Pierrick Capelle replacing Angelo Fulgini.
Christophe Pelissier (Lorient) is making a fourth substitution, with Adrian Grbic replacing Laurent Abergel.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lorient are coming forward and Armand Lauriente gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Angers.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Quentin Boisgard (Lorient) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Julien Laporte (Lorient) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Angers have a goal kick.
Thomas Leonard will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Thomas Mangani of Angers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
Great finish from Pierrick Capelle to give Angers a 2-0 lead.
Jimmy Cabot instrumental with a fine assist.
